params.name: filePath
params.description: An absolute path of an on-disk or in-memory file on the server

params.name: mode
params.description: Type of access you require to the file stream

params.name: charset
params.description: Character encoding identified by the file's byte order mark, if any; otherwise, JVM default file character set

params.description: Whether the file is usable with the `fileSeek` function
